summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the construction of new fire facilities; amending the 2005 Adopted Budget, including the 2005-2010 Capital Improvement Program (CIP); amending a CIP project; making appropriations to the Fleets and Facilities Department, from the Cumulative Reserve Subfund and the 2003 Fire Facilities Fund to pay for the construction of a new Fire Station 10; all by a three- fourths vote of the City Council.
